info.title: Google Affiliate Network API
info.description: Lets you have programmatic access to your Google Affiliate Network data.

get.description: Retrieves data about a single advertiser if that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to it. Only publishers can lookup advertisers. Advertisers can request information about themselves by omitting the advertiserId query parameter.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: advertiserId
parameters.description: The ID of the advertiser to look up. Optional.

get.description: Retrieves data about all advertisers that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: advertiserCategory
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimted list of advertiser categories. Valid categories are defined here: http://www.google.com/support/affiliatenetwork/advertiser/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=107581. Filters out all advertisers not in one of the given advertiser categories. Optional.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max number of items to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

parameters.name: minNinetyDayEpc
parameters.description: Filters out all advertisers that have a ninety day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

parameters.name: minPayoutRank
parameters.description: A value between 1 and 4, where 1 represents the quartile of advertisers with the lowest ranks and 4 represents the quartile of advertisers with the highest ranks. Filters out all advertisers with a lower rank than the given quartile. For example if a 2 was given only advertisers with a payout rank of 25 or higher would be included. Optional.

parameters.name: minSevenDayEpc
parameters.description: Filters out all advertisers that have a seven day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

parameters.name: relationshipStatus
parameters.description: Filters out all advertisers for which do not have the given relationship status with the requesting publisher.

get.description: Retrieves credit card offers for the given publisher.

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: The ID of the publisher in question.

parameters.name: advertiser
parameters.description: The advertiser ID of a card issuer whose offers to include. Optional, may be repeated.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: The set of fields to return.

get.description: Retrieves event data for a given advertiser/publisher.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: advertiserId
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of advertiser IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given advertiser IDs. Only used when under publishers role. Optional.

parameters.name: chargeType
parameters.description: Filters out all charge events that are not of the given charge type. Valid values: 'other', 'slotting_fee', 'monthly_minimum', 'tier_bonus', 'credit', 'debit'. Optional.

parameters.name: eventDateMax
parameters.description: Filters out all events later than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours after eventMin.

parameters.name: eventDateMin
parameters.description: Filters out all events earlier than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours from current date/time.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of link IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given link IDs. Optional.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max number of offers to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of member IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given member IDs. Optional.

parameters.name: modifyDateMax
parameters.description: Filters out all events modified later than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours after modifyDateMin, if modifyDateMin is explicitly set.

parameters.name: modifyDateMin
parameters.description: Filters out all events modified earlier than given date. Optional. Defaults to 24 hours before the current modifyDateMax, if modifyDateMax is explicitly set.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of order IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given order IDs. Optional.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

parameters.name: productCategory
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of product categories. Filters out all events that do not reference a product in one of the given product categories. Optional.

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of publisher IDs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given publishers IDs. Only used when under advertiser role. Optional.

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimited list of SKUs. Filters out all events that do not reference one of the given SKU. Optional.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters out all events that do not have the given status. Valid values: 'active', 'canceled'. Optional.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filters out all events that are not of the given type. Valid values: 'action', 'transaction', 'charge'. Optional.

get.description: Retrieves data about a single link if the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to it. Advertisers can look up their own links. Publishers can look up visible links or links belonging to advertisers they are in a relationship with.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: The ID of the link to look up.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

get.description: Retrieves all links that match the query parameters.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: advertiserId
parameters.description: Limits the resulting links to the ones belonging to the listed advertisers.

parameters.name: assetSize
parameters.description: The size of the given asset.

parameters.name: authorship
parameters.description: The role of the author of the link.

parameters.name: createDateMax
parameters.description: The end of the create date range.

parameters.name: createDateMin
parameters.description: The beginning of the create date range.

parameters.name: linkType
parameters.description: The type of the link.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max number of items to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

parameters.name: promotionType
parameters.description: The promotion type.

parameters.name: relationshipStatus
parameters.description: The status of the relationship.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Field for full text search across title and merchandising text, supports link id search.

parameters.name: startDateMax
parameters.description: The end of the start date range.

parameters.name: startDateMin
parameters.description: The beginning of the start date range.

get.description: Retrieves data about a single advertiser if that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to it. Only advertisers can look up publishers. Publishers can request information about themselves by omitting the publisherId query parameter.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: The ID of the publisher to look up. Optional.

get.description: Retrieves data about all publishers that the requesting advertiser/publisher has access to.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max number of items to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to 20.

parameters.name: minNinetyDayEpc
parameters.description: Filters out all publishers that have a ninety day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value: 0.0. Optional.

parameters.name: minPayoutRank
parameters.description: A value between 1 and 4, where 1 represents the quartile of publishers with the lowest ranks and 4 represents the quartile of publishers with the highest ranks. Filters out all publishers with a lower rank than the given quartile. For example if a 2 was given only publishers with a payout rank of 25 or higher would be included. Optional.

parameters.name: minSevenDayEpc
parameters.description: Filters out all publishers that have a seven day EPC average lower than the given value (inclusive). Min value 0.0. Optional.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The value of 'nextPageToken' from the previous page. Optional.

parameters.name: publisherCategory
parameters.description: Caret(^) delimted list of publisher categories. Valid categories: (unclassified|community_and_content|shopping_and_promotion|loyalty_and_rewards|network|search_specialist|comparison_shopping|email). Filters out all publishers not in one of the given advertiser categories. Optional.

parameters.name: relationshipStatus
parameters.description: Filters out all publishers for which do not have the given relationship status with the requesting publisher.

get.description: Retrieves a report of the specified type.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role of the requester. Valid values: 'advertisers' or 'publishers'.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: The ID of the requesting advertiser or publisher.

parameters.name: reportType
parameters.description: The type of report being requested. Valid values: 'order_delta'. Required.

parameters.name: advertiserId
parameters.description: The IDs of the advertisers to look up, if applicable.

parameters.name: calculateTotals
parameters.description: Whether or not to calculate totals rows. Optional.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date (exclusive), in RFC 3339 format, for the report data to be returned. Defaults to one day after startDate, if that is given, or today. Optional.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Filters out all events that are not of the given type. Valid values: 'action', 'transaction', or 'charge'. Optional.

parameters.name: linkId
parameters.description: Filters to capture one of given link IDs. Optional.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Max number of items to return in this page. Optional. Defaults to return all results.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Filters to capture one of the given order IDs. Optional.

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: The IDs of the publishers to look up, if applicable.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date (inclusive), in RFC 3339 format, for the report data to be returned. Defaults to one day before endDate, if that is given, or yesterday. Optional.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Offset on which to return results when paging. Optional.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters out all events that do not have the given status. Valid values: 'active', 'canceled', or 'invalid'. Optional.

allowPublisherCreatedLinks.description: True if the advertiser allows publisher created links, otherwise false.

category.description: Category that this advertiser belongs to. A valid list of categories can be found here: http://www.google.com/support/affiliatenetwork/advertiser/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=107581

commissionDuration.description: The longest possible length of a commission (how long the cookies on the customer's browser last before they expire).

contactEmail.description: Email that this advertiser would like publishers to contact them with.

contactPhone.description: Phone that this advertiser would like publishers to contact them with.

defaultLinkId.description: The default link id for this advertiser.

description.description: Description of the website the advertiser advertises from.

epcNinetyDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to publishers divided by the total number of clicks over the past three months. This value should be multiplied by 100 at the time of display.

epcSevenDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to publishers divided by the total number of clicks over the past seven days. This value should be multiplied by 100 at the time of display.

joinDate.description: Date that this advertiser was approved as a Google Affiliate Network advertiser.

logoUrl.description: URL to the logo this advertiser uses on the Google Affiliate Network.

merchantCenterIds.description: List of merchant center ids for this advertiser

payoutRank.description: A rank based on commissions paid to publishers over the past 90 days. A number between 1 and 4 where 4 means the top quartile (most money paid) and 1 means the bottom quartile (least money paid).

productFeedsEnabled.description: Allows advertisers to submit product listings to Google Product Search.

redirectDomains.description: List of redirect URLs for this advertiser

siteUrl.description: URL of the website this advertiser advertises from.

status.description: The status of the requesting publisher's relationship this advertiser.

kind.description: The kind for a page of advertisers.

nextPageToken.description: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

CcOffer.description: A credit card offer. There are many possible result fields. We provide two different views of the data, or "projections." The "full" projection includes every result field. And the "summary" projection, which is the default, includes a smaller subset of the fields. The fields included in the summary projection are marked as such in their descriptions.

additionalCardBenefits.description: More marketing copy about the card's benefits. A summary field.

additionalCardHolderFee.description: Any extra fees levied on card holders.

ageMinimum.description: The youngest a recipient of this card may be.

ageMinimumDetails.description: Text describing the details of the age minimum restriction.

annualFee.description: The ongoing annual fee, in dollars.

annualFeeDisplay.description: Text describing the annual fee, including any difference for the first year. A summary field.

annualRewardMaximum.description: The largest number of units you may accumulate in a year.

approvedCategories.description: Possible categories for this card, eg "Low Interest" or "Good." A summary field.

aprDisplay.description: Text describing the purchase APR. A summary field.

balanceComputationMethod.description: Text describing how the balance is computed. A summary field.

balanceTransferTerms.description: Text describing the terms for balance transfers. A summary field.

bonusRewards.description: For cards with rewards programs, extra circumstances whereby additional rewards may be granted.

amount.description: How many units of reward will be granted.

details.description: The circumstances under which this rule applies, for example, booking a flight via Orbitz.

carRentalInsurance.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

cardBenefits.description: A list of what the issuer thinks are the most important benefits of the card. Usually summarizes the rewards program, if there is one. A summary field.

cardName.description: The issuer's name for the card, including any trademark or service mark designators. A summary field.

cardType.description: What kind of credit card this is, for example secured or unsecured.

cashAdvanceTerms.description: Text describing the terms for cash advances. A summary field.

creditLimitMax.description: The high end for credit limits the issuer imposes on recipients of this card.

creditLimitMin.description: The low end for credit limits the issuer imposes on recipients of this card.

creditRatingDisplay.description: Text describing the credit ratings required for recipients of this card, for example "Excellent/Good." A summary field.

defaultFees.description: Fees for defaulting on your payments.

category.description: The type of charge, for example Purchases.

maxRate.description: The highest rate the issuer may charge for defaulting on debt in this category. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

minRate.description: The lowest rate the issuer may charge for defaulting on debt in this category. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

disclaimer.description: A notice that, if present, is referenced via an asterisk by many of the other summary fields. If this field is present, it will always start with an asterisk ("*"), and must be prominently displayed with the offer. A summary field.

emergencyInsurance.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

existingCustomerOnly.description: Whether this card is only available to existing customers of the issuer.

extendedWarranty.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

firstYearAnnualFee.description: The annual fee for the first year, if different from the ongoing fee. Optional.

flightAccidentInsurance.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

foreignCurrencyTransactionFee.description: Fee for each transaction involving a foreign currency.

fraudLiability.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

gracePeriodDisplay.description: Text describing the grace period before finance charges apply. A summary field.

imageUrl.description: The link to the image of the card that is shown on Connect Commerce. A summary field.

initialSetupAndProcessingFee.description: Fee for setting up the card.

introBalanceTransferTerms.description: Text describing the terms for introductory period balance transfers. A summary field.

introCashAdvanceTerms.description: Text describing the terms for introductory period cash advances. A summary field.

introPurchaseTerms.description: Text describing the terms for introductory period purchases. A summary field.

issuer.description: Name of card issuer. A summary field.

issuerId.description: The Google Affiliate Network ID of the advertiser making this offer.

issuerWebsite.description: The generic link to the issuer's site.

kind.description: The kind for one credit card offer. A summary field.

landingPageUrl.description: The link to the issuer's page for this card. A summary field.

latePaymentFee.description: Text describing how much a late payment will cost, eg "up to $35." A summary field.

luggageInsurance.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

maxPurchaseRate.description: The highest interest rate the issuer charges on this card. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

minPurchaseRate.description: The lowest interest rate the issuer charges on this card. Expressed as an absolute number, not as a percentage.

minimumFinanceCharge.description: Text describing how much missing the grace period will cost.

network.description: Which network (eg Visa) the card belongs to. A summary field.

offerId.description: This offer's ID. A summary field.

offersImmediateCashReward.description: Whether a cash reward program lets you get cash back sooner than end of year or other longish period.

overLimitFee.description: Fee for exceeding the card's charge limit.

prohibitedCategories.description: Categories in which the issuer does not wish the card to be displayed. A summary field.

purchaseRateAdditionalDetails.description: Text describing any additional details for the purchase rate. A summary field.

returnedPaymentFee.description: Text describing the fee for a payment that doesn't clear. A summary field.

rewardPartner.description: The company that redeems the rewards, if different from the issuer.

rewardUnit.description: For cards with rewards programs, the unit of reward. For example, miles, cash back, points.

rewards.description: For cards with rewards programs, detailed rules about how the program works.

additionalDetails.description: Other limits, for example, if this rule only applies during an introductory period.

amount.description: The number of units rewarded per purchase dollar.

category.description: The kind of purchases covered by this rule.

expirationMonths.description: How long rewards granted by this rule last.

maxRewardTier.description: The maximum purchase amount in the given category for this rule to apply.

minRewardTier.description: The minimum purchase amount in the given category before this rule applies.

rewardsHaveBlackoutDates.description: For airline miles rewards, tells whether blackout dates apply to the miles.

statementCopyFee.description: Fee for requesting a copy of your statement.

trackingUrl.description: The link to ping to register a click on this offer. A summary field.

travelInsurance.description: If you get coverage when you use the card for the given activity, this field describes it.

variableRatesLastUpdated.description: When variable rates were last updated.

variableRatesUpdateFrequency.description: How often variable rates are updated.

kind.description: The kind for a page of credit card offers.

advertiserId.description: The ID of advertiser for this event.

advertiserName.description: The name of the advertiser for this event.

chargeId.description: The charge ID for this event. Only returned for charge events.

chargeType.description: Charge type of the event (other|slotting_fee|monthly_minimum|tier_bonus|debit|credit). Only returned for charge events.

commissionableSales.description: Amount of money exchanged during the transaction. Only returned for charge and conversion events.

eventDate.description: The date-time this event was initiated as a RFC 3339 date-time value.

memberId.description: The ID of the member attached to this event. Only returned for conversion events.

modifyDate.description: The date-time this event was last modified as a RFC 3339 date-time value.

networkFee.description: Fee that the advertiser paid to the Google Affiliate Network.

orderId.description: The order ID for this event. Only returned for conversion events.

categoryId.description: Id of the category this product belongs to.

categoryName.description: Name of the category this product belongs to.

earnings.description: Amount earned by the publisher on this product.

networkFee.description: Fee that the advertiser paid to the Google Affiliate Network for this product.

publisherFee.description: Fee that the advertiser paid to the publisehr for this product.

unitPrice.description: Price per unit of this product.

publisherFee.description: Fee that the advertiser paid to the publisher.

publisherId.description: The ID of the publisher for this event.

publisherName.description: The name of the publisher for this event.

status.description: Status of the event (active|canceled). Only returned for charge and conversion events.

kind.description: The kind for a page of events.

nextPageToken.description: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

advertiserId.description: The advertiser id for the advertiser who owns this link.

createDate.description: Date that this link was created.

destinationUrl.description: The destination URL for the link.

endDate.description: Date that this link becomes inactive.

epcNinetyDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to publishers divided by the total number of clicks over the past three months on this link. This value should be multiplied by 100 at the time of display.

epcSevenDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to publishers divided by the total number of clicks over the past seven days on this link. This value should be multiplied by 100 at the time of display.

isActive.description: Flag for if this link is active.

name.description: The logical name for this link.

freeGift.description: Whether there is a free gift

freeShippingMin.description: Minimum purchase amount for free shipping promotion

percentOffMin.description: Minimum purchase amount for percent off promotion

priceCutMin.description: Minimum purchase amount for price cut promotion

promotionCodes.description: List of promotion code associated with the link

startDate.description: Date that this link becomes active.

kind.description: The kind for a page of links.

currencyCode.description: The 3-letter code of the currency in question.

classification.description: Classification that this publisher belongs to. See this link for all publisher classifications: http://www.google.com/support/affiliatenetwork/advertiser/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=107625&ctx=cb&src=cb&cbid=-k5fihzthfaik&cbrank=4

epcNinetyDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to this publisher divided by the total number of clicks over the past three months. Values are multiplied by 100 for display purposes.

epcSevenDayAverage.description: The sum of fees paid to this publisher divided by the total number of clicks over the past seven days. Values are multiplied by 100 for display purposes.

joinDate.description: Date that this publisher was approved as a Google Affiliate Network publisher.

payoutRank.description: A rank based on commissions paid to this publisher over the past 90 days. A number between 1 and 4 where 4 means the top quartile (most money paid) and 1 means the bottom quartile (least money paid).

sites.description: Websites that this publisher uses to advertise.

status.description: The status of the requesting advertiser's relationship with this publisher.

kind.description: The kind for a page of entities.

nextPageToken.description: The 'pageToken' to pass to the next request to get the next page, if there are more to retrieve.

Report.description: A ReportResource representing a report of a certain type either for an advertiser or publisher.

column_names.description: The column names for the report

end_date.description: The end of the date range for this report, exclusive.

matching_row_count.description: The number of matching rows before paging is applied.

rows.description: The rows of data for the report

items.description: Loop over each column in the row.

start_date.description: The start of the date range for this report, inclusive.

totals_rows.description: The totals rows for the report

items.description: Loop over each column in the row.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.name: key
key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.name: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.
